post:
OpenVZ is a container-based virtualization for Linux only. OpenVZ creates multiple secure, isolated Linux containers on a single physical server enabling better server utilization and ensuring that applications do not conflict.
OpenVZ provides accounts with full root access, provides ability to offer “guaranteed” and “burst” RAM, and upgrades to RAM and DISK are extremely easy and can be done without reboot.

We didn’t sacrifice the service quality in any way, shape or form. No more waiting. Just order, pay and receive your VPS server in minutes. Our SSD VPS is about speed and performance right from the start.
